name: Binditek Binding Machine, 19-Hole, 450 Sheets, Comb Binder Machines with 100 PCS 1/2" Comb Spines, for Letter Size, A5 or Smaller Sizes
short_description: 【Exceptional Value】Our binding machine comes with 1 box of 100 pieces of 1/2'' black PVC comb binding spines (for up to 90 sheets binding capacity).

➤ Max Binding Capacity: 450 sheets of paper (with 2'' comb binding spines, not included in the package). ➤ Max Punching Capacity: 10-12 sheets of regular printing paper (paper thickness ≤80g (20lb)), 2 sheets of 230g (≤85lb) cover/textured paper, 1 sheet of 5-12mil PVC cover.

【Lightweight yet Sturdy】Our binding machine features a robust cast iron base with a powder-coated surface, ensuring stability during punching and preventing lifting. The metal construction ensures reliable, long-term use. The ABS plastic shell is wear-resistant and crack-resistant, ensuring reliable and long-term performance.

➤ Tips:① The cutting blade of this binding machine is pre-oiled to prevent rust on the punch die. Important Notes:② To prevent staining important documents during punching, use test cardboard first to clean the blades.③ Before each use, clean the paper scraps inside the hole punch with tools such as an art knife.

【Easy Operation: Punch and Bind in One Step】Manual punching and binding require only two simple steps, featuring an integrated punching and binding system in a single machine. ➤ Tips: First, ensure the handle is installed at a 90-degree angle perpendicular to the tray; otherwise, the punch function cannot be activated. When pressing the handle to punch holes, press it all the way down in one motion without pausing to avoid paper jams.

【Adjustable Paper Margin】You can accurately punch holes at binding positions of 2mm, 3mm, 4mm and 5mm. The built-in Drawers type waste compartment ensures convenient disposal of paper scraps. Please make sure to clean up the paper scraps regularly, as failure to do so may result in damage to the comb binding machine.

【Humanized Design】Our comb binding machine features advanced cutting blades and an ergonomically designed curved handle, allowing you to cut paper effortlessly with minimal force. The 19-hole punch is specifically designed for Letter-size paper but can also accommodate A5 size (15 holes) or other smaller sizes. This comb binding machine is engineered for consistency, ensuring long-term use and professional-quality bound documents.

【Strict Quality Control and Reliable After-Sales Service】Every batch of our binding machines undergoes rigorous quality checks and testing before packaging. If you have any questions while using the binding machine, please feel free to contact us. Our friendly and reliable customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you.

name: 10 Pack White Binding Bars, 12 Inch Slide Grip Spine Bars for A4 Paper, 40-Sheet Capacity PVC Report Cover Bars for School, Office, Presentations, Documents Organization
short_description: 10-Pack Binding Bars for Daily Use: This set includes 10 slide grip binding bars, providing ample quantity for organizing school assignments, office paperwork, reports, and personal documents; perfect for grouping pages by subject or category, keeping materials neat and accessible; ideal for students, teachers, office staff, and professionals who need reliable document organization tools for everyday tasks and long-term storage needs.

12-Inch Bars Designed for A4 Paper: Each binding bar measures 12 inches (31 cm) in length and 0.35 inches (0.8 cm) in width, fitting standard A4 sheets securely without tearing or slipping; the precise dimensions allow easy insertion and smooth sliding, making the bars suitable for most letters, forms, printouts, and presentation documents; provides a firm grip that keeps pages together for transport, filing, or display.

12-Inch Bars Designed for A4 Paper: Each binding bar measures 12 inches (31 cm) in length and 0.35 inches (0.8 cm) in width, fitting standard A4 sheets securely without tearing or slipping; the precise dimensions allow easy insertion and smooth sliding, making the bars suitable for most letters, forms, printouts, and presentation documents; provides a firm grip that keeps pages together for transport, filing, or display.

Versatile for School, Office, and Presentations: These binding bars are perfect for homework packets, presentation scripts, resumes, office reports, training materials, and business portfolios; they help streamline document preparation and support professional presentation quality for meetings, interviews, and academic submissions; also ideal for sharing materials with classmates, colleagues, or project partners with clean and organized results.

40-Sheet Capacity for Efficient Organization: Each slide grip binding bar can securely hold up to 40 sheets, making it a practical solution for medium-sized documents, study notes, project files, or daily office paperwork; the strong gripping design prevents pages from scattering, keeping documents intact whether stored in drawers, backpacks, folders, or briefcases; provides a simple, tool-free method for keeping papers neat and properly arranged.
product_description: This 10-pack set of white slide grip binding bars provides a simple and effective way to organize and secure documents for school, office, and home use. Designed for users who need reliable and reusable binding solutions, the bars help maintain document order without requiring machines, staples, or punching tools. With 10 pieces included, the set provides enough supply for daily tasks, long-term storage, and sharing with classmates, coworkers, or team members. Each spine bar measures 12 inches (31 cm) in length and 0.35 inches (0.8 cm) in width, offering a comfortable and secure fit for A4 paper. The dimensions allow pages to slide smoothly into place while keeping them tightly bound for transport or presentation. These bars hold papers neatly together, making them suitable for school assignments, office paperwork, printed scripts, meeting handouts, instructional materials, and various project documents that require professional organization. Constructed from durable PVC, the binding bars are designed for long-term use. The material is sturdy, non-toxic, and resistant to bending, providing a dependable grip that keeps documents intact. Its smooth, comfortable surface also helps protect the paper spine from damage while ensuring that the bars can be reused for future binding needs. This makes them ideal for temporary reports, rotating projects, and long-term storage where durability and neat presentation matter. Each bar supports up to 40 sheets, offering a practical capacity for everyday tasks. Students can use them to assemble homework packets or class notes, while office workers can organize reports, proposals, resumes, and meeting materials. The bars contribute to a clean, professional appearance that enhances the clarity and presentation of documents. They are suitable for interviews, presentations, classroom submissions, business portfolios, and more. Whether organizing daily work, preparing materials for important presentations, or keeping personal files neatly arranged, these PVC binding bars deliver reliable performance and convenience. Their reusable nature, clean white appearance, and universal compatibility with A4 paper make them a versatile and valuable tool for anyone seeking efficient document management.
